title: borders issue (easy help i think)
body: why the fuck do i have a gold border when i was in plat. is it taking the lowest rank you obtained in the previous season? help please

replies.body:
It's likely either showing your old rank (since not all of those rewards have even been delivered yet, this is the most likely) or the queue you were playing in had specific rules on which border it will show. Here's a quick list for reference on which queues show which borders.
